amendment.description: Amendment adds a new section to the resolution directing the Clerk to add the text of H.R. 6169, as passed by the House, to the end of H.R. 8 as new matter before transmitting H.R. 8 to the Senate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section to the resolution directing the Clerk to add the text of H.R. 6169, to the end of H.R. 8.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (SC) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 186 (Roll no. 541).

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 240 - 183 (Roll no. 540).
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Scott (SC) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 186 (Roll no. 541).

House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (SC) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 186 (Roll no. 541).
